        "a(n) = T(n,20); T(n,k) = Sum_{i=1..n} binomial(n+1,i)*binomial(k-1,i-1)*binomial(n-i+k,k).",
        "From _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 25 2022: (Start)",
        "a(n) = (n+1)*binomial(n+19, 20)*Hypergeometric3F2([-19, -n, 1-n], [2, -n-19], 1).",
